text: Football 5-a-side is a sport that has been competed since the 2004 Summer Paralympics. The contest is a single event played by men but not women, so far Brazil have won three times. == Medalists == {| |- | 2004 Athens | | | |- | 2008 Beijing | | | |- | 2012 London | | | |} medalists football 5
title: List of Paralympic medalists in football 5-a-side
